text: @FLOTUS @realDonaldTrump @POTUS The world no longer can depend on the once fine works of Americans, nor to hope America will be the first to create a vaccine, nor America would be the first to get Covid19 under control. Instead it must move on without. It’s not America first, it is America not even in the race
